text:
GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
BABY & INFANT EQUIPMENT – TUNISIA
Non-medical baby equipment – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for baby and infant equipment adapted to the
Tunisian market. Safety-critical and medical-grade products are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: BABY_EQUIPMENT_TN
Usage: Private household use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Feeding & preparation Bottle warmer, Sterilizer, Baby food cooker
Monitoring Baby monitor (audio/video)
Mobility Stroller, Pram, Baby carrier
Car safety Car seat, Booster seat
Furniture High chair, Travel cot, Bassinet
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 400 TND
M: 401 – 1,200 TND
H: 1,201 – 3,000 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage (CORE)
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during household use
- Repair or replacement
4.2 Electrical / Mechanical Failure
- Electrical failure (powered devices)
- Mechanical failure
4.3 Extended Warranty

- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical breakdown
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
5. General Exclusions
- Consumables (bottles, teats, accessories)
- Medical or monitoring devices
- Normal wear and tear
- Professional or childcare facility use
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
ELECTRONIC PRODUCTS – TUNISIA
Retail consumer electronics – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for consumer electronic products adapted
specifically to the Tunisian retail market. It is intended for internal development use.
1. Scope
Risk profile: ELECTRONIC_PRODUCTS_TN
Usage: Private individual use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Mobile Smartphones
Computing Laptops, MacBook, Tablets
Audio Headphones, Earbuds, Speakers
TV & Home Televisions
Gaming Game consoles, Controllers
Wearables Smartwatches
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 1,500 TND
M: 1,501 – 4,000 TND
H: 4,001 – 8,000 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage (CORE)
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Screen breakage
- Repair or replacement
4.2 Oxidation / Liquid Damage
- Liquid infiltration
- Humidity damage
- Corrosion of internal components

4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical failure
- Electrical or electronic breakdown
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (Restricted)
- Theft following burglary only
- Police report mandatory
- Partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Cosmetic damage
- Loss without theft
- Professional use
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
FURNITURE – TUNISIA
Living room furniture – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for household furniture adapted to the Tunisian
market. Decorative items are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: FURNITURE_TN
Usage: Private household use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Living room Sofa, Table, Coffee table
Media furniture TV stand
Lighting Lamp, Lighting system
Fragile furniture Glass table
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 800 TND
M: 801 – 2,000 TND
H: 2,001 – 5,000 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage (CORE)
- Sudden accidental damage
- Breakage of structure or glass
- Repair or replacement
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Scratches and cosmetic damage
- Improper assembly
- Professional use
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
GARDEN & DIY – TUNISIA
Garden and DIY tools – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for garden and DIY tools adapted to the
Tunisian market. Professional-grade tools are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: GARDEN_DIY_TN
Usage: Private household use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Garden Lawn mower, Trimmer, Hedge trimmer, Blower
Power tools Drill, Grinder, Sander, Screwdriver
DIY equipment Welding machine (consumer), Workbench
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 500 TND
M: 501 – 1,500 TND
H: 1,501 – 3,500 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Mechanical & Electrical Failure (CORE)
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical failure
- Motor failure
4.2 Accidental Damage
- Sudden accidental damage
- Repair or replacement
5. General Exclusions
- Professional use

- Normal wear and tear
- Consumables
- Improper use
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
HEALTH, HYGIENE & WELLNESS – TUNISIA
Consumer non-medical devices – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for consumer Health, Hygiene and Wellness
devices adapted to the Tunisian market. Medical-grade and prescription devices are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: HEALTH_WELLNESS_TN
Usage: Private individual use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Hygiene & grooming Electric toothbrush, Hair trimmer, Electric shaver, Hair dryer
Hair styling Curling iron, Hair straightener
Health monitoring Smart scale, Thermometer, Blood pressure monitor, Pulse oximeter
Wellness devices Epilator, Massage device, Massage chair
Light therapy Wake-up light, Light therapy lamp (consumer)
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 300 TND
M: 301 – 900 TND
H: 901 – 2,000 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage (CORE)
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during domestic use
- Repair or replacement
4.2 Electrical / Electronic Failure
- Electrical failure
- Electronic malfunction
- Power-related damage

4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical failure
- Electrical or electronic breakdown
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
5. General Exclusions
- Consumables and accessories
- Medical-grade or prescription devices
- Normal wear and tear
- Professional or clinical use
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
HOME APPLIANCES – TUNISIA
Household appliances – Tunisia Market
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for household appliances adapted to the
Tunisian market. Focus is on durability, repairability and cost control.
1. Scope
Risk profile: HOME_APPLIANCES_TN
Usage: Private household use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Cold appliances Refrigerator, Freezer, Fridge-freezer
Laundry Washing machine, Dryer, Washer-dryer
Dishwashing Dishwasher
Cooking Oven, Cooking hob
Climate Air conditioner
Accessories Ice maker (integrated)
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 2,000 TND
M: 2,001 – 4,500 TND
H: 4,501 – 7,500 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Extended Warranty – CORE
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical failure
- Electronic component failure
- Repair with parts, labor and technician travel
4.2 Accidental Damage (LIMITED)
- Sudden accidental damage
- Excludes cosmetic damage

- Repair only (no replacement)
4.3 Electrical Surge Damage
- Damage caused by power surge or short circuit
- Very relevant for Tunisian electrical network
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Consumable parts (filters, seals)
- Improper installation
- Professional or rental use
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
SPORT & OUTDOOR – TUNISIA (ADAPTED)
Recreational sport & fitness equipment adapted to
Tunisia
Currency: TND
This document defines the insurance configuration for recreational sport and fitness equipment
adapted to the Tunisian market. Cold-climate and non-relevant sports are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: SPORT_OUTDOOR_TN
Usage: Private recreational use only.
Market: Tunisia.
2. Eligible Products (Tunisia Relevant)
Category Products
Home fitness Exercise bike, Indoor bike, Walking treadmill, Rower
Racket sports Padel racket, Tennis racket
Outdoor leisure Camping tent, Camping furniture, Camping stove
Cycling accessories Home trainer (non-electric)
Protection gear Helmet, Protective goggles
3. Value Buckets (TND)
L: 0 – 400 TND
M: 401 – 1,200 TND
H: 1,201 – 3,000 TND (cap)
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage (CORE)
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal recreational use
- Repair or replacement
4.2 Mechanical Failure
- Mechanical breakdown
- Structural failure

5. General Exclusions
- Winter sports equipment (ski, snowboard)
- Professional or competitive use
- Normal wear and tear
- Consumables (strings, grips, balls)
- Second-hand or refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
BABY & INFANT EQUIPMENT – ESSENTIAL
Retail baby equipment with insurable value
UAE – AED
This specification covers baby & infant equipment suitable for affinity insurance. Consumables and
purely medical devices are excluded. Safety-critical rules are strictly defined.
1. Scope
Risk profile: BABY_EQUIPMENT_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private household use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential Only)
Category Included Products
Feeding & care devices Bottle warmer, Sterilizer, Bottle preparation machine, Thermometer, Baby food cooker
Monitoring & safety Baby monitor (audio/video), Cardiac monitor (consumer), Motion sensor
Mobility Stroller, Pram, Baby carrier, Car seat, Booster seat
Furniture High chair, Travel cot, Bassinet
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Consumables (bottles, teats, filters)
- Purely medical or hospital-grade devices
- Aspirator nasal manual or consumable-based
- Second-hand or refurbished products
- Custom-made medical devices
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal household use
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Electrical / Electronic Failure
- Electrical failure
- Electronic malfunction

- Applies to powered devices only
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical or electronic failure
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Hygiene-related issues
- Cosmetic damage
- Improper installation or misuse
- Professional or childcare facility use

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
BAGS, LUGGAGE & PERSONAL ACCESSORIES –
ESSENTIAL
High-volume retail items only
UAE – AED
This specification covers bags, luggage and selected personal accessories with sufficient value,
usage frequency and retail volume. Low-value accessories are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: BAGS_LUGGAGE_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private individual use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential & High Volume)
Category Included Products
Small leather goods Wallet, Card holder, Coin purse
Pouches & cases Pouch, Toiletry bag
Handbags Handbag, City bag
Backpacks Backpack, School backpack
Travel bags Travel bag, Sports bag, Duffle bag
Business bags Briefcase, Laptop bag
Luggage Suitcase (cabin, medium, large)
Storage Wardrobe case, Garment bag, Trunk
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Very small accessories (key cases, comb cases, cigarette cases)
- Low-value fabric pouches
- Custom-made or bespoke items
- Second-hand or refurbished items
- Professional transport cases
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Tears, breakage of structure or handles

- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary or snatching
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
4.3 Extended Warranty (Limited)
- Manufacturing defects
- Failure of zippers, wheels or handles
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear (scratches, fabric wear)
- Cosmetic damage
- Loss without theft
- Contents of bags
- Improper use or overloading
- Professional or commercial use

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
ELECTRONIC PRODUCTS ONLY
Coverages: Accidental Damage, Oxidation,
Extended Warranty, Theft (Optional)
UAE – AED
This document is the single source of truth for ELECTRONIC PRODUCTS coverage
implementation. Home appliances are explicitly excluded from this specification.
1. Scope
Risk profile: ELECTRONIC_PRODUCTS
Usage: Private household use only.
2. Eligible Electronic Products (FINAL LIST)
Category Products
Mobile devices Smartphones
Tablets & Computers Tablets, Laptops, MacBook, Ultrabooks
Wearables Smartwatches, Fitness trackers
Audio Headphones, Earbuds, Speakers
Gaming Consoles, Controllers
TV & Home Electronics Televisions, Audio systems
3. Coverage Modules
3.1 Accidental Damage (Casse)
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage caused by external event
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
3.2 Oxidation / Liquid Damage
- Liquid infiltration
- Internal oxidation or corrosion
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
3.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown

- Electrical breakdown
- Electronic component failure
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
3.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Forced entry proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
4. General Exclusions
- Intentional damage
- Normal wear and tear
- Cosmetic damage
- Loss without theft
- Professional or industrial use
- Refurbished products
- Accessories not integrated
5. Partner Commission
Allowed commission rates: 10%, 15%, 20%.
Commission applies to total price of selected coverages.

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
GARDENING & DIY – ESSENTIAL ONLY
High-volume retail products only
UAE – AED
This specification covers Gardening & DIY products with strong retail volume and standardized
usage. Professional, industrial, and low-value tools are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: GARDEN_DIY_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private household use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential & High Volume)
Category Included Products
Lawn care Lawn mower, Robot lawn mower
Cutting tools Chainsaw, Brush cutter, Hedge trimmer
Cleaning & blowing Leaf blower, Garden vacuum
Power tools Drill, Screwdriver, Grinder, Sander
Heat & welding (retail) Blowtorch, Small welding station
Work equipment Workbench, Wood lathe (small size)
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Professional or industrial machinery
- Measurement tools (square, measuring tape)
- Large welding stations
- Construction site equipment
- Rental or commercial tools
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal DIY or gardening use
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Oxidation / Water Exposure

- Rain or water infiltration
- Oxidation or corrosion of components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical or electronic failure
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear (blades, bits, consumables)
- Consumable parts
- Cosmetic damage
- Professional or commercial use
- Intentional damage
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
HEALTH, HYGIENE & WELLNESS DEVICES –
ESSENTIAL
Retail consumer health devices (non-medical
grade)
UAE – AED
This specification covers consumer Health, Hygiene and Wellness devices suitable for affinity
insurance. Medical-grade, prescription-only and consumable products are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: HEALTH_WELLNESS_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private individual use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential Only)
Category Included Products
Hygiene & grooming Electric toothbrush, Hair trimmer, Electric shaver, Curling iron, Hair straightener, Hair dryer
Health monitoring Smart scale, Thermometer, Blood pressure monitor, Glucometer, Pulse oximeter
Wellness devices Epilator, Anti-cellulite device, Pain relief device (consumer), Massage chair, Massage device
Light therapy Wake-up light, Light therapy device, Light therapy glasses
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Medical-grade or prescription devices
- Disposable sensors or consumables
- Professional therapy equipment
- Second-hand or refurbished products
- Hospital or clinical use devices
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal domestic use
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included

4.2 Electrical / Electronic Failure
- Electrical failure
- Electronic malfunction
- Applies to powered devices only
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical failure
- Electrical or electronic breakdown
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Consumable parts
- Cosmetic damage
- Improper use
- Professional or clinical use

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC
HOME APPLIANCES – EXTENDED WARRANTY
UAE – AED
This document is the single source of truth for the implementation of the HOME APPLIANCES
extended warranty product. Any logic not explicitly described here must not be implemented.
1. Scope
Risk profile: HOME_APPLIANCES
Coverage type: EXTENDED WARRANTY ONLY
Insurance (theft / accidental damage) is strictly excluded.
2. Eligible Products
Category Products
Cold Refrigerator, Freezer, Fridge-freezer, Icemaker
Washing Washing machine, Dryer, Washer-dryer
Dishwashing Dishwasher
Cooking Oven, Cooking hob (induction, ceramic, gas)
Air treatment Air conditioner
3. Covered Events
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical breakdown
- Electronic component failure
- Parts replacement
- Labor cost
- Technician travel
- Repair at home or workshop
- Replacement if repair is impossible or uneconomical
4. Limits & Conditions
- No deductible applies
- Maximum compensation per claim = purchase price
- Maximum total compensation = purchase price
- 30-day waiting period
- Coverage starts after manufacturer warranty expiry

5. Exclusions (Must Exclude)
- Theft
- Accidental damage
- Cosmetic damage
- Normal wear and tear
- Misuse or poor maintenance
- Incorrect installation
- Accessories not integrated
- Professional or industrial use
- Refurbished products
6. Pricing
Duration Bucket L (0–2,000) Bucket M (2,001–6,000) Bucket H (6,001–11,000)
12 months 5% 6% 7%
24 months 8.5% 10% 11.5%
7. Partner Commission
Allowed commission rates: 10%, 15%, 20%.
Commission is applied after warranty price calculation and does not affect pricing logic.
8. Pricing Formula
warranty_price = product_value × rate
partner_commission = warranty_price × commission_rate
net_revenue = warranty_price - partner_commission
9. Mandatory Data Fields
- product_type
- brand
- model
- purchase_date
- purchase_price
- serial_number (if available)

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
LIVING ROOM & LOUNGE FURNITURE –
ESSENTIAL
Retail furniture with insurable value
UAE – AED
This specification covers living room furniture with sufficient value, fragility, and retail volume to
justify affinity insurance. Low-value and purely decorative items are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: LIVING_FURNITURE_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private household use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential Only)
Category Included Products
Seating Sofa, Couch
Tables Dining table, Coffee table
TV furniture TV stand, Media unit
Lighting (electrical) Floor lamp, Table lamp
Fragile furniture Glass table, Glass coffee table
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Decorative items (frames, rugs, cushions)
- Low-value lamps or bulbs
- Outdoor furniture
- Custom-made furniture
- Second-hand or refurbished furniture
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage of structure or glass elements
- Repair or replacement
- Transport and handling damage after delivery (limited period)

4.2 Electrical Damage (Lighting Only)
- Electrical failure of integrated lighting systems
- Internal wiring damage
- Applies only to powered furniture
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Structural failure
- Mechanical defects (recliner mechanisms)
- Electrical failure (if applicable)
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear (fabric aging, scratches)
- Stains and discoloration
- Cosmetic damage
- Improper use or installation
- Professional or commercial use
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
MICRO-MOBILITY & PERSONAL TRANSPORT –
ESSENTIAL
High-volume retail products only
UAE – AED
This specification covers essential, high-volume micro-mobility products suitable for retail
distribution. Professional, motorized road vehicles and niche products are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: MICRO_MOBILITY_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private and recreational use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential & High Volume)
Category Included Products
Bicycles City bike, Mountain bike (VTT)
Electric bicycles Electric bike, Electric mountain bike
Scooters Kick scooter, Electric scooter (trottinette électrique)
Boards Skateboard, Electric skateboard, Hoverboard
Self-balancing Gyropod, Gyroroue
Rollers Roller skates
Light vehicles Mini scooter, Tricycle, Electric tricycle
Quadricycles Quadricycle, Electric quadricycle
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Motorcycles, mopeds, cars
- Professional or competition bicycles
- Rental fleet vehicles
- Commercial delivery vehicles
- High-speed road-legal vehicles
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal recreational use

- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Oxidation / Liquid Damage
- Water or liquid infiltration
- Oxidation or corrosion of components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical or electronic failure (electric models)
- Battery and motor failure (excluding normal wear)
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary or assault
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear (tires, brakes, chains)
- Consumable parts
- Cosmetic damage
- Professional or competitive use
- Intentional damage
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
OPTICAL & HEARING – ESSENTIAL
Retail medical-adjacent devices with insurable
value
UAE – AED
This specification covers Optical & Hearing products suitable for affinity insurance. Consumables
and purely medical services are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: OPTICAL_HEARING_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private individual use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential Only)
Category Included Products
Optical frames Prescription glasses, Sunglasses (with or without prescription)
Contact lenses (devices) Reusable contact lenses (non-disposable)
Hearing devices Hearing aids (behind-the-ear, in-ear)
3. Explicitly Excluded Products

- Cleaning solutions and consumables
- Medical consultations or exams
- Custom-made medical devices without serial number
- Second-hand or refurbished devices
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage of frames or device casing
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Oxidation / Moisture Damage
- Moisture or sweat infiltration

- Oxidation or corrosion of internal components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical failure
- Electronic malfunction (hearing aids)
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary or snatching
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Loss without theft
- Cosmetic scratches
- Consumables
- Medical misuse or improper fitting
- Professional or clinical use

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
OPULENCIA – PREMIUM & LUXURY PRODUCTS
High-value retail & luxury items
UAE – AED
This specification defines the Opulencia premium catalog, dedicated to luxury and high-value
consumer goods. Products are strictly filtered to ensure value, traceability and insurability.
1. Scope
Risk profile: OPULENCIA_PREMIUM
Usage: Private individual use only.
Positioning: Premium / Luxury affinity insurance.
2. Eligible Products (Premium Only)
Category Included Products
Luxury leather goods Luxury handbags, Briefcases, Wallets (premium brands)
Watches Luxury watches, Smart luxury watches
Jewelry Rings, Necklaces, Bracelets (non-consumable)
Fashion accessories Belts, Scarves, Sunglasses (luxury brands)
Travel luxury Premium luggage, Trunks
3. Value Buckets (Mandatory)
M: 3,000 – 10,000 AED
H: 10,001 – 50,000 AED
XH: 50,001 – 300,000 AED
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage or deformation
- Repair by authorized service or replacement
4.2 Theft – CORE COVERAGE
- Theft with aggression or burglary
- Police report mandatory
- Replacement based on declared value

4.3 Oxidation / Environmental Damage
- Humidity or liquid damage
- Environmental degradation
- Authorized repair only
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Loss without theft
- Counterfeit products
- Professional or commercial use
- Refurbished or second-hand items without proof
6. Partner Commission
Allowed commission rates: 10%, 15%, 20%.
Commission applied to total premium.

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
PERSONAL CARE & WELLNESS DEVICES
Coverages: Accidental Damage, Oxidation,
Extended Warranty
UAE – AED
This document defines the implementation rules for PERSONAL CARE & WELLNESS DEVICES.
This category is distinct from consumer electronics and home appliances.
1. Scope
Risk profile: PERSONAL_CARE_DEVICES
Usage: Private household use only.
2. Eligible Products (FINAL LIST)
Category Products
Hair removal Epilators
Grooming Hair trimmer, Electric shaver
Hair styling Curling iron, Hair straightener, Rollers, Hot air brush, Heated brush, Hair dryer
Oral care Electric toothbrush, Dental station, Water flosser
Wellness Massage chair / Massage seat
3. Coverage Modules
3.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage due to external event
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
3.2 Oxidation / Liquid Damage
- Liquid infiltration
- Oxidation or corrosion of internal components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
3.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown
- Electrical breakdown

- Electronic component failure
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4. General Exclusions
- Consumable parts (heads, blades, brushes)
- Normal wear and tear
- Cosmetic damage
- Intentional damage
- Professional or medical use
- Refurbished products
5. Partner Commission
Allowed commission rates: 10%, 15%, 20%.
Commission applies to total price of selected coverages.

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
SOUND & MUSIC – ESSENTIAL ONLY
High-volume products only
UAE – AED
This specification intentionally limits Sound & Music products to high-volume, standardized items
suitable for retail distribution. Professional, rare or low-volume instruments are excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: SOUND_MUSIC_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private and semi-professional use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential & High Volume)
Category Included Products
String instruments Electric guitar, Acoustic guitar, Bass guitar
Keyboards Digital piano, Keyboard (arranger / master)
Drums & rhythm Electronic drum kit, Drum machine
Wind instruments Saxophone, Trumpet
DJ & audio gear DJ controller, Mixing console, Audio interface, Sound card
Monitoring & output Studio monitors, PA speakers, Amplifiers
Recording & streaming Microphones, Audio recorders, Streaming equipment
Accessories (covered) Headphones
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Classical instruments (violin, cello, harp, mandolin, ukulele)
- Acoustic drum kits
- Large orchestral instruments (tuba, trombone, gong)
- Furniture (DJ furniture, stands)
- Software-only products
- Professional touring equipment
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal use

- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included
4.2 Oxidation / Liquid Damage
- Liquid infiltration
- Oxidation or corrosion of electronic components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical and electronic breakdown
- Electrical failure
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Forced entry proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear (strings, skins, reeds)
- Consumables
- Cosmetic damage
- Professional touring use
- Intentional damage
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
SPORTS, FITNESS & OUTDOOR – ESSENTIAL
Retail high-volume equipment only
UAE – AED
This specification covers Sports, Fitness and Outdoor equipment with sufficient retail volume,
standardization and insurable value. Professional, extreme and regulated equipment is excluded.
1. Scope
Risk profile: SPORT_OUTDOOR_ESSENTIAL
Usage: Private recreational use only.
2. Eligible Products (Essential Only)
Category Included Products
Fitness equipment Exercise bike, Walking treadmill, Rower, Stepper
Winter & hiking Hiking equipment, Snowboard, Ski (recreational)
Protection gear Helmet, Protective goggles
Camping Camping furniture, Tent, Camping stove
Golf & fishing Golf clubs, Fishing rod, Reel, Fish finder
Water sports Surfboard, Bodyboard, Kayak, Canoe, Paddle board
3. Explicitly Excluded Products
- Professional gym equipment
- Motorized watercraft
- Diving regulators and life-support systems
- Weapons or harpoon guns
- Competition-grade sports equipment
- Rental or commercial equipment
4. Coverage Modules
4.1 Accidental Damage
- Sudden and accidental physical damage
- Breakage during normal recreational use
- Repair or replacement
- Parts and labor included

4.2 Oxidation / Water Exposure
- Water exposure or humidity damage
- Oxidation or corrosion of components
- Diagnostic, parts and labor included
4.3 Extended Warranty
- Mechanical breakdown
- Structural failure
- Electrical failure (fitness equipment)
- Applies after manufacturer warranty expiry
4.4 Theft – OPTIONAL (On Demand)
- Theft following burglary
- Proof required
- Explicit partner activation required
5. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Consumables (grips, fins, straps)
- Cosmetic damage
- Extreme or professional use
- Intentional damage
- Refurbished products

GARANTY AFFINITY – DEV SPEC (FINAL)
TEXTILE & FOOTWEAR – ZARA ONLY
Affinity protection for clothing & shoes
(brand-restricted)
UAE – AED
This specification defines a brand-specific affinity insurance product for ZARA only, inspired by the
AssurTextile concept. Coverage is limited to accidental damage on new items.
1. Scope
Risk profile: TEXTILE_FOOTWEAR_ZARA
Brand restriction: ZARA only
Usage: Private individual use only.
2. Eligible Products
Category Included Products
Clothing Pants, Jeans, Sweaters, T-shirts, Shirts, Jackets, Coats, Blazers, Suits, Dresses
Footwear Sneakers, Boots, Moccasins, Heels
3. Coverage Modules
3.1 Accidental Damage – CORE
- Accidental damage
- Indelible stains
- Rips and tears
- Burns
Coverage period: 12 months
Reimbursement cap (clothing): up to equivalent of 1,000 (local currency equivalent)
Reimbursement cap (shoes): up to equivalent of 2,000 (local currency equivalent)
4. General Exclusions
- Normal wear and tear
- Manufacturing defects
- Loss or theft
- Intentional damage
- Items not purchased at ZARA

- Second-hand items
5. Commercial Rules (Configurable)
Coverage duration: 12 months
Distributor incentive: configurable (example reference: 20%)
Challenge / sales incentive: optional per campaign

ASSURMAX – SIMPLIFIED PLAN (UAE)
Market: UAE
Currency: AED
Effective Date: January 2026
====================================================
1. OVERVIEW
====================================================
ASSURMAX is a simplified flat-rate insurance plan for consumer electronics
sold in the UAE. Single tier, fixed premium, covers up to 3 products.
====================================================
2. ELIGIBLE PRODUCTS
====================================================
Category: Consumer Electronics
Included Products:
- Smartphones (iPhone, Samsung, etc.)
- Laptops (MacBook, Dell, HP, Lenovo, etc.)
- Tablets (iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, etc.)
- Televisions (Smart TVs, LED/OLED TVs)
- Smartwatches (Apple Watch, Samsung Galaxy Watch, etc.)
- Gaming Consoles (PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch)
====================================================
3. COVERAGE MODULES
====================================================
Coverage Type | Details
-----------------------|----------------------------------
Accidental Damage | Drops, shocks, cracked screens
Mechanical Failure | Internal component failure
Electrical Failure | Power issues, circuitry failure
Liquid Damage | Water exposure, oxidation
Extended Warranty | Coverage beyond manufacturer warranty
====================================================
4. GENERAL EXCLUSIONS
====================================================
- Normal wear & tear
- Cosmetic damage only (scratches that don't affect function)
- Professional or commercial use
- Second-hand or refurbished devices
- Intentional damage or fraud
- Loss or theft (not covered)
====================================================
5. PRICING & CAPS (SIMPLIFIED)
====================================================

Plan: ASSURMAX (Single Tier)
Pack Configuration:
- Pack Cap: 5,000 AED total coverage
- Max Products Covered: 3 products per pack
- Per Item Cap: Unlimited (within 5,000 AED pack total)
Premium Structure:
- Premium Rate: 11% of pack cap
- Annual Premium: 550 AED (5,000 × 11%)
- 24-Month Premium: 1,100 AED (550 × 2)
Eligibility Rules:
- Individual product price must be ≤ 5,000 AED
- If product > 5,000 AED, use STANDARD pricing instead
- Customer can insure up to 3 products under one ASSURMAX pack
- Premium is flat rate regardless of individual product values
Example 1:
Product: iPhone 15 Pro (4,500 AED)
✅ Eligible for ASSURMAX
Premium: 550 AED per year
Example 2:
Product: MacBook Pro (12,000 AED)
❌ Not eligible for ASSURMAX (exceeds 5,000 AED cap)
Use STANDARD pricing instead
Example 3:
Pack with 3 products:
- iPhone (4,500 AED)
- iPad (2,000 AED)
- Smartwatch (1,500 AED)
Total value: 8,000 AED
❌ Not eligible (exceeds 5,000 AED pack cap)
====================================================
6. PARTNER COMMISSION
====================================================
Commission calculated on gross written premium (GWP).
Available Commission Rates:
- 10% of GWP
- 15% of GWP
- 20% of GWP
Commission rate is configured per partner and fixed for the policy duration.

Example:
Annual Premium: 550 AED
Commission (15%): 82.50 AED
Net Premium: 467.50 AED
====================================================
7. MARKET AVAILABILITY
====================================================
- UAE: ✅ Available (this document)
- Tunisia: ❌ Not available yet (use STANDARD pricing)
